SEARCH
Package controller

Class AdministratorController

Object
AdministratorController
public class AdministratorController extends Object
The AdministratorController class provides Administrator with methods for managing staff, appointments, and medicine inventory.

It depends on Appointment, AppointmentOutcomeRecord, Doctor, Medicine, User, AppointmentOutcomeRecordStore, AppointmentStore, DoctorStore, MedicineStore, and StaffStore.

    • addStaff

      public static String addStaff(User user) throws Exception
      Adds a staff member to the system.
      Parameters:
      user - the staff member to add
      Returns:
      the ID of the staff member
      Throws:
      Exception - if the role is invalid (neither DOCTOR nor PHARMACIST)

    • getStaff

      public static User getStaff(String userId) throws Exception
      Gets a staff member by the user ID.
      Parameters:
      userId - the user ID of the staff member
      Returns:
      the staff member
      Throws:
      Exception - if the staff member is not found or the staff member is neither a doctor nor a pharmacist

      Exception - if the role is invalid (neither DOCTOR nor PHARMACIST)

      public static List<User> searchStaff(boolean isMale)
      Searches for staff members by gender.
      Parameters:
      isMale - the gender of the staff members to search for, true for Male, false for Female

      the list of staff members with the specified gender

    • searchStaff

      public static List<User> searchStaff(String name)
      Searches for staff members by name. The search is case-insensitive.
      Parameters:
      name - the name of the staff members to search for
      Returns:
      the list of staff members with the specified name

      user - the new staff member record
      Throws:
      Exception - if the staff member is not found or the staff member is neither a doctor nor a pharmacist

      Throws:
